alert.note: Alert for Iron; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:13AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iron and west central Marquette Counties through 245 AM EDT/145 AM CDT/... At 213 AM EDT/113 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Squaw Lake, or 19 miles northeast of Crystal Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Iron and west central Marquette Counties, including the following locations... Republic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
